column1: What is one key property of Gaussian distributions that makes GPs useful?
column2: Sums of Gaussians are Gaussian, and marginal distributions of multivariate Gaussians are still Gaussian.

column1: Are conditional distributions of multivariate Gaussians still Gaussian?
If we condition on the FDDs of a GP, is the resulting distribution also Gaussian?
Given the covariance of a set of points, how can we predict a new point?
